lead_paragraph: SECUNDA--Madeleine, 86, of Castle Rock, CO, passed away peacefully on July 10, 2016. Survived by her children Gwynne (Walt) and Brent, grandchildren, Hannah, Charles Evan and James. Preceded in death by her husband, Arnold and son Ross. Born in Washington Heights, she worked for Chase Manhattan Bank and then the American Geographical Society. She went on to graduate from Lehman College later in life. She was loved by many and made everyone feel special in her loving way. For service information please visit: www.boulevard riversidechapel.com or call the chapel at: 516-295-3100. 1/3
